alert.note: Alert for Ford; Gray; Haskell; Hodgeman; Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 2:48AM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong South Winds and Fire Danger again This afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 064, 076, 077, 078, 086, AND 087... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman, Fire Weather Zone 076 Haskell, Fire Weather Zone 077 Gray, Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford, Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward and Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade. * WINDS...South 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and continued dormant vegetation, any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly. Any outdoor burning, or outdoor activities involving sparks or flames, should be avoided.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Ford; Gray; Haskell; Hodgeman; Meade; Seward
